headline.main: North Dakota Native Americans Hint at Exiting State Oil Tax Deal
headline.print_headline: North Dakota Native Americans Hint at Exiting State Oil Tax Deal

docs.snippet: A leading official on a Native American reservation where roughly a third of North Dakota's oil is extracted has voiced his strongest threat to date to walk away from a tax-sharing deal with the state, ratcheting up energy industry concerns about ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A leading official on a Native American reservation where roughly a third of North Dakota's oil is extracted has voiced his strongest threat to date to walk away from a tax-sharing deal with the state, ratcheting up energy industry concerns about dueling levy rates and regulations.

headline.main: Mali Detains 20 Suspected Islamists, Including Two French: Sources
headline.print_headline: Mali Detains 20 Suspected Islamists, Including Two French: Sources

docs.snippet: Police in Mali have detained about 20 suspected Islamist militants in recent days, including at least two French citizens and the organizer of an attack a restaurant in Bamako in March, security sources said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police in Mali have detained about 20 suspected Islamist militants in recent days, including at least two French citizens and the organizer of an attack a restaurant in Bamako in March, security sources said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Uber Settles Wrongful Death Lawsuit in San Francisco
headline.print_headline: Uber Settles Wrongful Death Lawsuit in San Francisco

docs.snippet: Ride service Uber has reached a tentative settlement in a lawsuit brought by the family of a 6-year-old girl who died in a San Francisco car accident, according to court filings....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ride service Uber has reached a tentative settlement in a lawsuit brought by the family of a 6-year-old girl who died in a San Francisco car accident, according to court filings.

headline.main: ‘Super PACs’ Buy Cable Ads to Raise Rick Perry’s National Profile

docs.snippet: The outside groups backing Rick Perry’s presidential candidacy are buying advertising time on national cable networks to give the former Texas governor a shot in the polls so he is invited to the first debate....
docs.abstract: The outside groups backing Rick Perry’s presidential candidacy are buying advertising time on national cable networks to give the former Texas governor a shot in the polls so he is invited to the first debate.

headline.main: Celgene Will Buy Drug Developer Receptos for $7.32 Billion
headline.print_headline: Celgene Will Buy Drug Developer Receptos for $7.32 Billion

docs.snippet: Cancer drug maker Celgene said it will buy Receptos for $7.32 billion in cash, gaining a drug Receptos is studying as a treatment for multiple sclerosis and ulcerative colitis....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cancer drug maker Celgene said it will buy Receptos for $7.32 billion in cash, gaining a drug Receptos is studying as a treatment for multiple sclerosis and ulcerative colitis.

headline.main: CSX 2Q Profit Improves 5 Percent as Fuel Costs Stay Low
headline.print_headline: CSX 2Q Profit Improves 5 Percent as Fuel Costs Stay Low

docs.snippet: CSX Corp.'s second-quarter profit improved 5 percent on lower costs, even though the number of shipments the railroad delivered declined slightly....
docs.lead_paragraph: CSX Corp.'s second-quarter profit improved 5 percent on lower costs, even though the number of shipments the railroad delivered declined slightly.

headline.main: Yum Brands Says KFC, Taco Bell Sales Improved in 2Q
headline.print_headline: Yum Brands Says KFC, Taco Bell Sales Improved in 2Q

docs.snippet: Yum Brands said Tuesday that revenue at its KFC and Taco Bell chains improved in the second quarter and said its sales struggles in China got a little easier....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yum Brands said Tuesday that revenue at its KFC and Taco Bell chains improved in the second quarter and said its sales struggles in China got a little easier.
